name: Immortalis
description:
Use the immortal enemies to solve puzzles in this short top down game. No matter how many times you kill them their always there.

WASD = Movement       ↑←↓→ = Shoot in that Direction

----------

If you enjoy this game please consider Subscribing to my youtube channel.

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7iw7FtpQ84OuT3QC40m9dw

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/borcorosso/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/BorcoRosso

Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/borcorosso

TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@realborcorosso?lang=en

----------

All assets used in this game were created within the Jam duration.  Immortalis was made for the Pursuing Pixels James Jam Game Jam. I used this palette created by MirruTatep. This project helped me grow as a game dev. I had to think about how to implement certain mechanics then execute it. I am happy with the result and I hope you like it too!
